node.excerpt: This is it. However it reads, this will officially be my first released writing piece. Its been such a long time coming. I’ve had all kinds of creative ideas dating back to around 10 years ago, way back when the world was due to end in 2012; then…

frontmatter.title: A promise to live strong
frontmatter.description: The first step in my 1000 day journey into the unknown to find and climb my mountain, and the story leading up to it.
